con:part.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="urn:solvency.verification.service:v1" name="Application" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:plink="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/05/partner-link/" xmlns:wsdlsoap11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdlsoap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap11enc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap11env="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:soap12env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap12enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/03/addressing" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:tns="urn:solvency.verification.service:v1" xmlns:s0="urn:solvency.verification.service:datatypes:v1"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:solvency.verification.service:v1" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:import namespace="urn:solvency.verification.service:datatypes:v1"/> <xs:complexType name="ClientNotFoundFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="detail" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClientValidationError"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="detail" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="VerifySolvency"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="client_id" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="VerifySolvencyResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="VerifySolvencyResult" type="s0:SolvencyReport" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ClientNotFoundFault" type="tns:ClientNotFoundFault"/> <xs:element name="ClientValidationError" type="tns:ClientValidationError"/> <xs:element name="VerifySolvency" type="tns:VerifySolvency"/> <xs:element name="VerifySolvencyResponse" type="tns:VerifySolvencyResponse"/> </xs:schema> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:solvency.verification.service:datatypes:v1" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:complexType name="ClientIdentity"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreditHistory"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="debt" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="late_payments" type="xs:integer" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="has_bankruptcy" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Explanations"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="credit_score_explanation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="income_vs_expenses_explanation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="credit_history_explanation" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Financials"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="monthly_income" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="monthly_expenses" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="SolvencyStatus_statusType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="solvent"/> <xs:enumeration value="not_solvent"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="SolvencyStatus"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="s0:SolvencyStatus_statusType" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SolvencyReport"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="client_identity" type="s0:ClientIdentity" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="financials" type="s0:Financials" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="credit_history" type="s0:CreditHistory" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="credit_score" type="xs:integer" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="solvency_status" type="s0:SolvencyStatus" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="explanations" type="s0:Explanations" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ClientIdentity" type="s0:ClientIdentity"/> <xs:element name="CreditHistory" type="s0:CreditHistory"/> <xs:element name="Explanations" type="s0:Explanations"/> <xs:element name="Financials" type="s0:Financials"/> <xs:element name="SolvencyStatus" type="s0:SolvencyStatus"/> <xs:element name="SolvencyReport" type="s0:SolvencyReport"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="VerifySolvency"> <wsdl:part name="VerifySolvency" element="tns:VerifySolvency"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="VerifySolvencyResponse"> <wsdl:part name="VerifySolvencyResponse" element="tns:VerifySolvencyResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ClientNotFoundFault"> <wsdl:part name="ClientNotFoundFault" element="tns:ClientNotFoundFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ClientValidationError"> <wsdl:part name="ClientValidationError" element="tns:ClientValidationError"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:service name="SolvencyVerificationService"> <wsdl:port name="Application" binding="tns:Application"> <wsdlsoap11:address location="http://localhost:8000/SolvencyVerification"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <wsdl:portType name="Application"> <wsdl:operation name="VerifySolvency" parameterOrder="VerifySolvency"> <wsdl:documentation>VerifySolvency(clientId) -> SolvencyReport
Main entry point: orchestrates all services to verify client solvency.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="VerifySolvency" message="tns:VerifySolvency"/> <wsdl:output name="VerifySolvencyResponse" message="tns:VerifySolvencyResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="ClientNotFoundFault" message="tns:ClientNotFoundFault"/> <wsdl:fault name="ClientValidationError" message="tns:ClientValidationError"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="Application" type="tns:Application"> <wsdlsoap11:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="VerifySolvency"> <wsdlsoap11:operation soapAction="VerifySolvency" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="VerifySolvency"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="VerifySolvencyResponse"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ClientNotFoundFault"> <wsdlsoap11:fault name="ClientNotFoundFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="ClientValidationError"> <wsdlsoap11:fault name="ClientValidationError" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> </wsdl:definitions>
